scenario_text.value: Haru! Haru where are you?! Say something!

This is...a building? I don’t remember seeing
any sort of structure here before...

This is...the library! It looks exactly the
same as the one in our town!

(What to do... Should I go inside? Me, all by
myself...?)

Pull yourself together! If you lose heart
here, you’ll never rescue him...!
This time I’ll definitely save someone!

*huff*... *huff*... What the heck is this
place? It wasn’t here yesterday...
Hold on, Aoi, I’m right behind you!
